title: Integrated Task-Based University English Oral Training Design for Corporate Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of job-specific technical terminology
context.additional_context: Emphasizes immediately applicable oral English training in current professionals' work contexts. Combines asynchronous/synchronous activities in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can read job-related English texts, summarize key content, and deliver an oral presentation within 3 minutes.
Learners can listen to voice inputs based on work scenarios and reproduce key content with 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete reading-listening-speaking integrated activities with over 90% success using an integrated task model.
Learners can deliver a natural English oral presentation for 15 minutes in simulated business meeting contexts.

resources: Job-related English materials (reports, meeting minutes, etc.)
Online collaborative platform with speech recognition

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
